thread.section_title: Fabletics Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Fabletics | fabletics.com | 14 of 532
thread.title: BSD

author: BSD
title: BSD
text: I was looking for plus size athletic ware and saw Kate on Ellen and said they had added plus size. I was glad to see several options, but it would have been nice on certain pages to be able to sort by those only available in my size. Also, I tried to order some "outfits" and when I went to the cart, they were not the price that was on the page where I had selected the items. It was supposed to be a first time order special, but it didn't show in the card, so I deleted and did not order the outfits. One time I clicked on a link and it said it couldn't find the page but I got there another route. Looks like web page could use some better development.
